import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name:'', email:'', city:'', course:'', phone:'' } } //formdata_submition handleSubmit=(e)=> { alert() } render() { var { name, email, city, course, phone }= this.state return (<>
) } }
